mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APIG_GUID) FROM TB_BIGDATA WHERE STATUS = 2 AND CATEGORY = '疫情专项'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT i.POLICE_CATEGORY) FROM TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND i.AREA_NAME = '省厅' AND i.POLICE_CATEGORY IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT i.AREA_NAME) FROM TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND i.AREA_NAME != '省厅' AND i.AREA_NAME IS NOT NULL
SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS WHERE APP_NAME ='广东公安疫情防控平台'

SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a INNER JOIN TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i ON a.ACTUAL_ID = i.ACTUAL_ID INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID AND b.APIPRODUCT_ID = a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_id WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项'

SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a INNER JOIN TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i ON a.ACTUAL_ID = i.ACTUAL_ID INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID AND b.APIPRODUCT_ID = a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_id WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.CURRENT_TIME = #{time}

SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) count,a.POLICE_CATEGORY name FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a INNER JOIN TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i ON a.ACTUAL_ID = i.ACTUAL_ID INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID AND b.APIPRODUCT_ID = a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_id WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.AREA_NAME = '省厅' AND a.POLICE_CATEGORY IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.POLICE_CATEGORY

SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) count,a.AREA_NAME name FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a INNER JOIN TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i ON a.ACTUAL_ID = i.ACTUAL_ID INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID AND b.APIPRODUCT_ID = a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_id WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.AREA_NAME != '省厅' AND a.AREA_NAME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.AREA_NAME

SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) count,a.CURRENT_TIME time FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a INNER JOIN TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i ON a.ACTUAL_ID = i.ACTUAL_ID INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID AND b.APIPRODUCT_ID = a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_id WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.CURRENT_TIME >= #{time} GROUP BY a.CURRENT_TIME ORDER BY a.CURRENT_TIME

SELECT SUM(REQ_COUNT) count,a.CURRENT_TIME time FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a INNER JOIN TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i ON a.ACTUAL_ID = i.ACTUAL_ID INNER JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID=b.APIG_GUID AND b.APIPRODUCT_ID = a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_id WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.APP_NAME = '广东公安疫情防控平台' AND a.CURRENT_TIME >= #{time} GROUP BY a.CURRENT_TIME ORDER BY a.CURRENT_TIME
SELECT NAME FROM TB_BIGDATA WHERE STATUS = 2 AND CATEGORY = '疫情专项' order by name
SELECT b.NAME,SUM(REQ_COUNT) count FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a LEFT JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID = b.APIPRODUCT_ID WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' GROUP BY b.NAME

SELECT b.NAME,SUM(REQ_COUNT) count FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a LEFT JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID = b.APIPRODUCT_ID WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.current_time >= #{last7Time} GROUP BY b.NAME

SELECT b.NAME,SUM(REQ_COUNT) count FROM TB_APP_STATISTICS a LEFT JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON a.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID = b.APIPRODUCT_ID WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' AND a.current_time = #{time} GROUP BY b.NAME
SELECT b.NAME,COUNT(DISTINCT i.APP_NAME) count FROM TB_SERVICE_INSTANCE i LEFT JOIN TB_BIGDATA b ON i.SERVICE_GUID = b.APIG_GUID WHERE b.STATUS = 2 AND b.CATEGORY = '疫情专项' GROUP BY b.NAME
